title: The Last of Us Part II in February? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.17.19
description:
Get $10 off your first order of $15 when you use promo code "KindaFunny" https://grhb.me/kindafunny

Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://GetQuip.com/games right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Go to http://Brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES for 10% off AND free shipping.

Tim and Greg recap the rumors that are pointing to you spending Valentine's Day with Joel and Ellie. 

Time Stamps - 
00:03:40 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Daniel Massey, Black Jack, Colton Yoder, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:05:12 - TLOU2 in February? Jospeh Knoop @ IGN
00:10:52 Best Friend Q. - I’m wondering if the reason we are seeing less gameplay and demos at E3 press conferences is because it is getting harder to put these demos together. - Jay Pimentel
00:14:40 - Cyberpunk demo at PAX WEST, Giuseppe Nelva @ Twinfinite
00:18:40 - No Man’s Sky Fans are awesome, GoFundMe
00:19:50 - Elden Ring’s is More Dark Souls than Sekiro, Esra Krabbe @ IGN
00:22:35 - Fallout 76 Battle Royale Continues
00:23:30 Best Friend Q. - Nuclear Winter for Fallout 76 is pretty fun for a Battle Royale Mode. - Andy Prince
00:26:05 - Out today
00:27:10 - Grubhub
00:35:52 -  BROOKLINEN
00:30:28 -  QUIP
Reader mail   -
00:33:30 - I have an inquiry about the up coming Zelda: Link's Awakening remake. Is the price tag ($59.99) a little steep for a remake of a 26 year old Gameboy classic game? - TheSheepWhisper
00:38:45 - Do you think moving away from cgi trailers is the next step for games? - Dan Wilkinson
00:44:38 - My hype levels for Final Fantasy 7 remake are through the roof, but March is a long ways away. What do you think the chances we get the demo from e3 on PSN? - Ateryu73
00:45:48 - FF7 did something that I hate in RPGs, where you have to basically choose your party right off the bat, and you have your main three and that's it. No other party members get XP, etc. Did they mention anything at the demo about this? Now, if it's just Midgar it won't be too many characters. However, can you play with all four at once? Or is it still just three? - Lee Pollero
00:48:55 - What are your thoughts on there not being a National Dex in Pokémon Sword/Shield? - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:53:55 - Squad Up:Rob Devereux(PC) Steam: kylar1231 (Uplay: mosher1231)
00:54:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:Greg and Andrea
